alert.note: Alert for Fluvanna; Louisa (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 22 at 5:46PM EDT until June 22 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wakefield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Louisa County in central Virginia... Fluvanna County in central Virginia... * Until 630 PM EDT. * At 545 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Louisa, moving south at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Ferncliff around 555 PM EDT. Kents Store and Troy around 600 PM EDT. Palmyra around 605 PM EDT. Fork Union and Columbia around 615 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Dixie, Nahor, Louisa Airport, Green Springs, Stage Junction, Shores, Zion Crossroads, Central Plains, Antioch and Union Mills. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 757-899-2415, posting to the NWS Wakefield Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSWAKEFIELDVA.
